Class EditActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Activity
      • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class EditActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
    Activity which allows user to customize the phrase tree to suit his/her needs better Similar to MainActivity but focuses more on customization

      • fillMapRecursion

        public void fillMapRecursion(java.lang.String soFar,
                             JSONObject next)
                      throws JSONException
        Generate remainder of the map for the phrase tree based on the json data loaded in the app
        Parameters:
        soFar - String which is so far in the map, and for what children phrases can be added
        next - Next set of phrases to be parsed for generating child phrases
        Throws:
        JSONException
